extension.description: Tailscale is a secure network that just works. Zero config VPN. Installs on any device in minutes. This addon provides Tailscale VPN functionality for LibreELEC, allowing you to securely access your media center from anywhere.
extension.disclaimer: This addon requires internet connectivity and a Tailscale account.
extension.news: v1.82.1.1 (2025-09-05) - Initial release - Tailscale v1.82.1 - Support for Raspberry Pi platforms - Web-based configuration - Automatic startup and authentication
